thread.title: New Market Report Mixed Retailers in the Philippines
thread.title_full: New Market Report Mixed Retailers in the Philippines | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: New Market Report Mixed Retailers in the Philippines
text:
(MENAFN Press) As consumers experience increasingly busy lifestyles amidst improving economic conditions the value of convenience increases. Mixed retailers benefit from the nature of their stores in carrying a variety of product offerings to serve as a one-stop shop for various consumer needs.
Competitive Landscape
As of 2014 SM Retail Inc continued to hold a dominant lead on mixed retailers with 42% value share. Its continued expansion of shopping centres helped maintain its lead. Over the review period SM Retail Inc also showed increasing efforts to develop their brands. SM Department Store has been rebranded as The SM Store a brand with a focus on fashion with offerings from not just local but foreign brands as well. This move was aimed at gaining an even stronger competitive edge leading innovation to answer changing consumer needs. The rebrand to The SM Store aims to improve the image of their department stores as existing stores began the process of development towards the new store design and layout as well.
Full Report Details at
 - 
Industry Prospects
For mixed retailers growth is expected to continue towards 2019 driven mainly by continued expansion and backing of leading players. The convenience offered by mixed retailers as well as increased purchasing power due to improving economic conditions is expected to continue over the forecast period. As generally the presence of mixed retailing operators remains limited there continues to be room for increased competition over the forecast period as well.
Report Overview
Discover the latest market trends and uncover sources of future market growth for the Mixed Retailers industry in Philippines with research from Euromonitor's team of in-country analysts.
Find hidden opportunities in the most current research data available understand competitive threats with our detailed market analysis and plan your corporate strategy with our expert qualitative analysis and growth projections.
If you're in the Mixed Retailers industry in Philippines our research will save you time and money while empowering you to make informed profitable decisions.
The Mixed Retailers in Philippines market research report includes:
 * Analysis of key supply-side and demand trends
 * Detailed market shares for international and locally-based retailers
 * Historic number of stores selling space and values company and brand market shares
 * Five year forecasts of market trends and market growth 
 * Robust and transparent market research methodology conducted in-country
Our market research reports answer questions such as:
 * How big is the Mixed Retailers channel in Philippines?
 * Who are the leading retailers in Philippines?
 * How are mixed retailers competing against the growth of grocery retailers?
 * Are consumers switching towards value retailers or moving upmarket?
Reasons to Get this Report
 * Gain competitive intelligence about market leaders
 * Track key industry trends opportunities and threats
 * Inform your marketing brand strategy and market development sales and supply functions
